name: 黃希敏
objective: 本科目旨在探討現實世界裡語言和溝通的種種現象，如：社會中之語言變化、大眾媒體的語言使用等，並介紹應用語言學門之緣起和現況。學生將需要分享自己對於本地或國際有關語言應用議題的觀察，例如：職場溝通模式、辨識性言詞分析、語言教學/測試趨勢、口筆翻譯項目、語言在新型媒體中之應用等。
schedule:
01. Introduction
02. Phonetics (Yule Ch. 03)
03. Phonology (Yule Ch. 04)
04. Etymology (Yule Ch. 05)
05. Morphology (Yule Ch. 06)
06. Grammar (Yule Ch. 07)
07. Syntax (Yule Ch. 08)
08. Semantics (Yule Ch. 09)
09. Pragmatics (Yule Ch. 10)
10. Discourse Analysis (Yule Ch. 11)
11. Neurolinguistics (Yule Ch. 12)
12. First language acqusition (Yule Ch. 13)
13. Second language acqusition/learning (Yule Ch. 14)
14. Writing & lang history/change (Yule Ch. 16 & 17)
15. Language and regional variation (Yule Ch. 18)
16. Sociolinguistics (Yule Ch. 19)
17. Language and Culture (Yule Ch. 20)
18. Review and Final
scorePolicy:
1. Group discussion & Oral reports: 30%
2. Forum: Individual presentations: 70%
3. Excessive AWOL (5 and more) will lead to the course failure.
materials:
Textbook:
Yule, G. (2010). The Study of Language. Cambridge University Press.
Reference book:
Parker, F., & Riley, K. (2010). Linguistics for Non-linguists. Pearson Education.
